name: Northwest Marionberry Pie
author: aijiesi
summary: Marionberries are a sweet blackberry hybrid grown in the Northwest that make a perfect pie!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) package pastry for a 9-inch double crust pie
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Mix marionberries, 3/4 cup sugar, flour, and lemon juice together in a large bowl until well-combined
Fit the bottom of a 9-inch pie plate with 1 pie crust
Cover with second crust; crimp edges to seal
Cut four to eight 1-inch slits in the top crust with a knife
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking until crust is golden, 45 to 50 minutes more
Let cool completely before serving, about 1 hour
